markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 592 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This staff is topped with carved animal and monster heads. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to identify animals. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Animal Staff **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_know direction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)
  • **1st** [_magic fang_](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316)
Animal Staff (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_animal messenger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), _summon animal_
  • **3rd** [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10), _summon animal_
Animal Staff (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **4th** _summon animal_
  • **5th** _animal form_, [_moon frenzy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=203), _summon animal_
name: Animal Staff (Major)
